body: What exactly counts as a false leaving thread?
body_tagged: What exactly counts as a false leaving thread?
title: False leaving thread

replies.body: When they made a thread about them leaving Avicus, but they can still be seen actively on the network... I guess.
replies.body_tagged: When they made a thread about them leaving Avicus, but they can still be seen actively on the network... I guess.

replies.body: When a user says they are leaving permanently although they don't.
replies.body_tagged: When a user says they are leaving permanently although they don't.

replies.body: Look at examples to see properly
replies.body_tagged: Look at examples to see properly

replies.body: So if a person leaves permanently, and he just comes back and plays again, that's counted right?
replies.body_tagged: So if a person leaves permanently, and he just comes back and plays again, that's counted right?

reply_to.body: When a user says they are leaving permanently although they don't.
reply_to.body_tagged: When a user says they are leaving permanently although they don't.

reply_to.body: So if a person leaves permanently, and he just comes back and plays again, that's counted right?
reply_to.body_tagged: So if a person leaves permanently, and he just comes back and plays again, that's counted right?

replies.body: What would be counted as "coming back"?
replies.body_tagged: What would be counted as "coming back"?

replies.body: If a certain individual has made a post that he's going to leave Avicus, he has to be gone for 3 days minimum (that's what I heard, I don't think that's it anymore. If it's not 3 days minimum, then they have to be gone for good). If they come back before this time, they would be banned for a certain period of time. However, if someone like Snow or Petlas decided to come back and visit or talk with players, they wouldn't be banned. I'm not sure if you would be banned for becoming active again after a few months
replies.body_tagged: If a certain individual has made a post that he's going to leave Avicus, he has to be gone for 3 days minimum (that's what I heard, I don't think that's it anymore. If it's not 3 days minimum, then they have to be gone for good). If they come back before this time, they would be banned for a certain period of time. However, if someone like Snow or Petlas decided to come back and visit or talk with players, they wouldn't be banned. I'm not sure if you would be banned for becoming active again after a few months

replies.body: Can I have an official response?
replies.body_tagged: Can I have an official response?

replies.body:
I'll give you a bit of trivia instead, tho not official: 
I believe I made the first "joke" fake leaving thread as a prank at some point back during MCZone :3
